mapper.select:
select
from
and tenant_id = #{tenantId} and user_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{userId}), '%') and user_coupon_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{userCouponId}), '%') and coupon_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{couponId}), '%') and coupon_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{couponType}), '%') and coupon_method like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{couponMethod}), '%') and coupon_amount like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{couponAmount}), '%') and use_vaild_date like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{useVaildDate}), '%') and use_expire_date like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{useExpireDate}), '%') and status like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{status}), '%') and relate_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relateType}), '%') and relate_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relateId}), '%') and access like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{access}), '%')
mapper.insert:
insert into
( tenant_id, user_id, user_coupon_id, coupon_id, coupon_type, coupon_method, coupon_amount, use_vaild_date, use_expire_date, relate_type, relate_id, access) values
( #{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userCouponId}, #{entity.couponId}, #{entity.couponType}, #{entity.couponMethod}, #{entity.couponAmount}, #{entity.useVaildDate}, #{entity.useExpireDate}, #{entity.relateType}, #{entity.relateId}, #{entity.access})

insert into
( tenant_id, user_id, user_coupon_id, coupon_id, coupon_type, coupon_method, coupon_amount, use_vaild_date, use_expire_date, status, relate_type, relate_id, access) values
(#{entity.tenantId},#{entity.userId},#{entity.userCouponId},#{entity.couponId},#{entity.couponType},#{entity.couponMethod},#{entity.couponAmount},#{entity.useVaildDate},#{entity.useExpireDate},#{entity.status},#{entity.relateType},#{entity.relateId},#{entity.access})
on duplicate key update tenant_id=values(tenant_id), user_id=values(user_id), user_coupon_id=values(user_coupon_id), coupon_id=values(coupon_id), coupon_type=values(coupon_type), coupon_method=values(coupon_method), coupon_amount=values(coupon_amount), use_vaild_date=values(use_vaild_date), use_expire_date=values(use_expire_date), status=values(status), relate_type=values(relate_type), relate_id=values(relate_id), access=values(access)
